flavor: "I may not be the mightiest Avenger, but I'm definitely the coolest."
name: Hawkeye
text: "Quick Draw" — Action: Exhaust Hawkeye → ready Hawkeye's bow.

name: Clint Barton
text: Weapon of Choice — Action: Spend 1 resource of any type → search your deck and discard pile for Hawkeye's Bow and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per phase).

name: Hawkeye's Bow
text:
Restricted.
Your hero gets +1 ATK and each of your [[Arrow]] attacks gain ranged.

name: Hawkeye's Quiver
text: You may play [[Arrow]] events attached to this card as if they were in your hand. Hero Action: Exhaust Hawkeye's Quiver → search the top 5 cards of your deck for an [[Arrow]] event and attach it faceup to this card.

flavor: "Is that all you got?"
name: Mockingbird
text: Interrupt: When the villain initiates an attack against you, spend 1 resource of any type and return Mockingbird to your hand → prevent all damage from this attack.

flavor: EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!
name: Sonic Arrow
text: Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Hawkeye's Bow → confuse an enemy and deal 3 damage to it (5 damage instead if it is already confused)

flavor: "Anyone ever tell you how your eyes sparkle when you're angry?" -- Clint Barton
name: Explosive Arrow
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Hawkeye's Bow and choose a player → deal 3 damage to the villain and each minion engaged with that player.

flavor: "Hail Hawkeye!" -- Clint Barton
name: Electric Arrow
text: Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Hawkeye's Bow → stun an enemy and deal 3 damage to it (5 damage instead if it is already stunned).

flavor: "It's a great way to get around." -- Clint Barton
name: Cable Arrow
text: Hero Action (thwart): Exhaust Hawkeye's Bow → remove 3 threat from a scheme, ignoring any crisis icons in play.

name: Vibranium Arrow
text: Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Hawkeye's Bow → deal 6 damage to an enemy. This attack gains piercing.

flavor: "When you fight alongside gods and monsters, it's not enough to be great; you have to the best." -- Clint Barton
name: Expert Marksman
text: Resource: Exhaust Expert Marksman → generate a [wild] resource for an [[Arrow]] event.

flavor: "You see I', literally pointing arrows at your, right?."
name: Hawkeye
text: Action: Exhaust this ally and discard 1 card from your hand → deal X damage to an enemy, where X is the number of printed resources on that card.

flavor: "As long as the Black Blade blazes darkly in my hand, I must fight on."
name: Black Knight
text: Black Knight's basic attack gains piercing.

flavor: "Sometimes being a gentleman means holding the door, and the rest of the building."
name: Goliath
text: Action: Goliath gets +4 ATK until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase, discard Goliath. (Max once per phase.)

flavor: "Cap isn't the only soldier who loves his country."
name: U.S. Agent
text: Retaliate 1.

name: Sky-Cycle
text: Attach to an [[Avenger]] ally. Max 1 per ally. Attached ally gains [[Aerial]]. Action: Exhaust Sky Cycle → ready attached ally.

flavor: "We mostly just wait for Cap to yell 'Avengers Assemble' and attack in the same direction as him" -- Clint Barton
name: Teamtraining
text:
Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player.
Each ally you control gets +1 hit point.

flavor: "Try that again. I dare you." -- Jessica Drew
name: Bereit für Action
text: Hero Action: Give an ally you control a tough status card.

name: War Machine
text:
Toughness.
War Machine's basic attack gains ranged.

flavor: "We come together to fight what can't be fought alone." -- Luke Cage
name: Die mächtigsten Helden der Welt
text: Hero Action: Exhaust an [[avenger]] character you control → ready another [[avenger]] character you control.

name: Spider-Woman
text: "Übermenschliche Agilität" — Unterbrechung: Sobald du eine Aspektkarte spielst, bekommt Spider-Woman bis zum Ende der Runde +1 WID, +1 ANG, und +1 VER. (Nur ein Mal pro Runde für jeden Aspekt.)

name: Jessica Drew
text: Doppelagent — Wähle beim Deckbau zwei Aspekte statt einem. Du musst von jedem dieser Aspekte gleich viele Karten in deinem Deck aufnehmen. Aktion:: Sieh dir die oberste Karte eines beliebigen Dekcs an. (Nur ein Mal pro Runde.)

flavor: "Das muss ich dir lassen, Junge. Ich hab ja schon viel Mist gesehen, aber das hier ist beeindruckender als das meiste."
name: Captain Marvel
text: Reaktion: nachdem Captain Marvel eine Basiskraft verwendet hat, ziehe 1 Karte.

name: Gewandtheit
text: Held Ressource: Erschöpfe Gewandtheit → erzeuge für eine Aspektkarte eine [wild]-Ressource.

name: Jessica Drews Apartment
text: Alter-Ego Aktion: Erschöpfe Jessica Drews Apartment → durchsuche die obersten 5 Karten deines Decks nach einer Aspektkarte und nimm sie auf deine Hand. Mische dein Deck.

name: Giftstoss
text: Held Aktion (Angriff): Füge einem Gegner 5 Schaden zu.

flavor: "Kannst du mich das nächste mal bitte warnen, bevor du diese Kraft einsetzt, okay?" -- Peter Parker
name: Pheromone
text: Held Aktion: betäube und verwirre einen Gegner.

name: Giftimmunität
text: Held Aktion: Heile 3 Schaden von Spider-Woman und gib ihre eine Zäh-Statuskarte.

flavor: "Jetzt muss ich nur noch leise wie eine Spinne einen Weg hineinfinden." -- Jessica Drew
name: Unauffällig
text: Held Aktion (Widerstand): Entferne insgesamt 3 Bedrohung von beliebigen Plänen im Spiel.

flavor: "Die Leute glauben immer, dass ich fliegen kann. Kann ich nicht. Aber den Gleitflug hab ich wirklich gut drauf." -- Jessica Drew
name: Gleitflug
text: Held Aktion: Mache Spider-Woman spielbereit. Bis zum Ende der Runde erhält sie das Merkmal [[Fliegend]].

flavor: "Alright you bunch of losers. Who wants a piece of me?."
name: Spider-Girl
text: Response: After you play Spider-Girl from your hand, stun and confuse a minion.

flavor: "You are in Wakanda now!" -- T'Challa
name: Den Vorteil ausnutzen
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to an enemy. If that enemy is stunned or confused, draw 1 card.

name: Durchdringender Hieb
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy. This attack gains piercing.

flavor: "Seriously, what is it with New York? Would it kill you to invade Denver once?."
name: Spider-Man
text: Response: After you play Spider-Man from your hand, remove 3 [per_hero] threat from a side scheme.

name: Erfahrener Ermittler
text: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Hero Response: After a side scheme is defeated, exhaust Skilled Investigator → draw 1 card.

flavor: "Don't be scared, honey. Just think about how jealous the other kids will be when you tell them how Iron Man rescued you." -- Tony Stark
name: Räumt das Gebiet
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from a scheme. If this removes the last threat on that scheme, draw 1 card.

name: Adrenalin-Stimulierung
text: Setup. Hero Action: Discard this card and remove it from the campaign log → ready your hero and heal 5 damage from them.

name: Taktischer Scanner
text: Setup. Hero Action: Discard this card and remove it from the campaign log → draw 5 cards.

name: Notfall-Teleporter
text: Setup. Hero Action: Discard this card and remove it from the campaign log → search your deck and discard pile for an ally, put it into play, and give it a tough status card.

name: Laserkanone
text: Setup. Hero Action: Discard this card and remove it from the campaign log → deal 5 damage to the villain and each enemy engaged with you.

name: Basis-Upgrade: Widerstand
text:
Permanent. Setup.
You get +2 hit points.
Your hero gets +1 THW.

name: Power-Upgrade: Widerstand
text: Permanent. Setup. You get +2 hit points. Your hero gets +1 THW. Response: After you defeat a side scheme, exhaust this card → draw 1 card.

name: Basis-Upgrade: Angriff
text:
Permanent. Setup.
You get +1 hit points.
Your hero gets +1 ATK.

name: Power-Upgrade: Angriff
text: Permanent. Setup. You get +1 hit points. Your hero gets +1 ATK. Hero Response: After you defeat a minion, exhaust this card → draw 1 card.

name: Basis-Upgrade: Verteidigung
text:
Permanent. Setup.
You get +3 hit points.
Your hero gets +1 DEF.

name: Power-Upgrade: Verteidigung
text: Permanent. Setup. You get +3 hit points. Your hero gets +1 DEF. Hero Response: After you defend against an attack, exhaust this card → draw 1 card.

name: Basis-Upgrade: Erholung
text:
Permanent. Setup.
You get +4 hit points.
Your alter-ego gets +1 REC.

name: Power-Upgrade: Erholung
text: Permanent. Setup. You get +4 hit points. Your alter-ego gets +1 REC. Response: After you use your REC, exhaust this card → draw 1 card.

flavor: "A beautiful parasite growing inside the world's most secure computer systems." -- Arnim Zola
name: Zolas Algorithmus
text: Alter-Ego Action Exhaust your alter-ego and spend a [mental] resource → discard this card.

flavor: "This is going to need sutures." -- Stephen Strange
name: Medizinischer Notfall
text: Forced Response: At the end of your turn, take 1 damage if you are in hero form. Alter-Ego Action: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck and spend a [physical] resource → discard this card.

name: Kriegsrecht
text: Your hand size is reduced by 1. Alter-Ego Action: Deal yourself an encounter card and spend a [energy] resource → discard this card.

flavor: "These dissenters breed conflict. They are your true enemies." -- Hydra News Media
name: Anti-Helden-Propaganda
text: Your hero gets -1 THW, -1 ATK, and -1 DEF. Alter-Ego Action: Take 2 damage and spend a [wild] resource → discard this card.
